head_commit.message:
Fix: xstate load and restore now checks `cpuid` to avoid `#GP` or `#UD` on older CPUs (#15)

* fix: xstate load and restore now checks cpuid

* try suppress `unsafe_attr_outside_unsafe` for `#[naked]`

* update nightly version

* update ci.yml to match arceos and continue-on-error on nightly

* rollback `#[unsafe(naked)]` to `#[naked]`
